**Name:** Dr. Mew
@@ @@
**Security Clearance:** Level 3
@@ @@
**Occupation:** Site Psychologist
@@ @@
**Gender:** [GENDER EXPUNGED]
@@ @@
**Location:** God knows where
@@ @@
**Profile:** Dr. Mew is a cat. They don't do much. You'll probably find them in a corner, on the ceiling, or under a desk. They are a normal foundation employee. Except they are a cat.

@@ @@

Hey there, my name is Mew/Kai. I've been here for a over 6 years, lurking, writing, critiquing.

I go by they/he/it pronouns, really anything works (not she)

I love Your Turn to Die, I'm crazy obsessed with it pls talk to me about YTTD
I also love BSD, Vocaloid, FNF, Danny Phantom, Mouthwashing, Pico's School, Madness Combat, IDV, TWST, and more

I have five cats and a ghost cat[[footnote]]RIP Hemingway, youâ€™ll be missed. He lived a long 15 years. ðŸ–¤On that note I also have a ghost dog and three ghost hamsters, unless my other passed pets found this house too lol[[/footnote]]

If youâ€™ve got any ideas that fit these criteria that you need reviewing/potential greenlighting feel free to shoot me a pm or catch me on IRC @ Mew-ltiverse, discord @mewltiverse

I draw, if you need artwork for an article, let me know I don't have set commission prices or anything though lol

Plural system, my headmates have only written one thing, but some have helped me with my stuff, and others got stuff in the works
You'll most commonly run into "J", who's the most active besides me

I do have [[[*https://ko-fi.com/mewltiverse | this though]]]

My favorite ideas and things im more likely to review if they include:
* AIs
* Social media
* Internet SCPs
* Media SCPs
* Character driven stories
* Sapient characters within media
* Anime/cartoon stuff
* Animals
* Things that shouldn't work but do (things that do a thing with a story)
* Format screws
* Memetic stuff
* Psychology

I tackle ideas featuring sensitive topics quite often due to the personal nature of these pieces. I consider myself as someone good at handling them, so I'm open to giving advice on how to handle these things.

[[tab Characters]]
Here are my reoccurring/hoping to have reoccurred characters profiles. Iâ€™ve been wanting to make them for a while, and I finally got off my ass and did it, aha.

Feel free to use any of them in a tale or SCP! Just let me know in advance, please. :)
@@ @@

++ __**Researcher Oliver Crane**__

**Name:** Researcher Oliver Crane

**Clearance Level:** Level 4

**Specialties:** Anomalous technology specialist, technological expert, visually triggered cognitohazards, vocal exploration leader

**Location:** Primarily Site 288, Site 23, occasionally other sites when needed.

**History:** Researcher Crane was born completely blind, which was proven useful in research of visually activated cognitohazards. Before joining the Foundation, Researcher Crane had a job as a Computer & Information Research Scientist. He excelled at the job, knowing far more about coding and software engineering then required. Researcher Crane developed his own touch to hear technology in the form of a glove and Bluetooth earpiece to aid him around daily life.

Researcher Crane grew up in Airdrie, Scotland. He lacked an ideal upbringing, undergoing severe emotional and physical abuse by his father daily. The trauma of his past affects him to this day, as he developed Post Traumatic Stress Disorder and Dissociative Identity Disorder.. Researcher Crane has biweekly therapy sessions with Dr. Johnson.

Researcher Crane is often accompanied by Dr. Stanley Diamond when off-site, due to the twoâ€™s friendship.

> **Author Notes:**
> 
> There are a multitude of phrases, items, and a few places which are triggering to him. Most cause from minor anxiety to panic attacks and occasionally flashbacks upon mention or contact, although a few items such as ropes, belts, and metal forks and knives, and insults about his blindness almost always send him into flashbacks, as those things were all very prominent in his childhood trauma.
> 
> Dislikes when people look at his blindness as a disability
> 
> Seen as "the nice one" by many, but typically only keeps to himself to avoid argument. Will stand up for himself if he feels heâ€™s being disrespected.
> 
> Crane often dissociates, which is the reason some of his spoken dialogue often has â€œstuttersâ€ in it. Heâ€™s pretty much dissociating at least 35-45% of a day, but is so used to it, he powers through.
> 
> Crane has very bad trust issues, as he was abused by his father, and his mother didnâ€™t care, even lying for him if suspicions were raised.
> 
> Crane and Diamond are dating
> 
> You can find him in:
> 
> * [[[SCP-4208 | SCP-4208]]]
> * [[[SCP-5090 | SCP-5090]]]
> * [[[SCP-5554 | SCP-5554]]]
> * [[[SCP-5551 | SCP-5551]]]
> * [[[SCP-4688 | SCP-4688]]] (mentioned)
> * [[[SCP-5567 | SCP-5567]]] (mentioned)
> * [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/messaging-crustaceans | Messaging Crustaceans]]]

@@ @@
++ __**Dr. Stanley Diamond**__

**Name:** Dr. Stanley Diamond

**Clearance Level:** Level 3

**Occupation:** Geologist

**Specialties:** Archeological anomalies, geological anomalies

**Location:** Site 288, Site 23, wherever needed

**History:** Dr. Diamond was the head researcher of SCP-â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ, and involved in Incident SCP-â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ. In result of the incident, Dr. Diamond received a facial wound.

Dr. Diamondâ€™s mother was murdered by his uncle when he was five years old. Although he dislikes the details, the exact situation was traumatic, ever changing how he viewed the world, and the people in it.

**Profile:** Dr. Diamond has been described by others as â€œa selfish assholeâ€ around anyone who is not Researcher Oliver Crane. Dr. Diamond has developed a somewhat protective nature for Researcher Crane, accompanying him on offsite missions, as well as emotionally stressing ones.

> **Authorâ€™s Notes:**
> 
> Diamond has PTSD and Borderline Personality Disorder, but has refuted the diagnoses, despite being diagnosed twice by two different doctors. He believes these diagnoses make him weak, but doesnâ€™t think Craneâ€™s CPTSD diagnosis makes him weak, revealing a double standard heâ€™s sort of been raised to have.
> 
> After his mother was murdered, his father completely ignored her, and would get upset at Diamond for crying and mourning his motherâ€™s death. His father wanted him to be strong and â€œmanlyâ€ as he grew up, and wasnâ€™t afraid to use physical punishment to get Diamond to obey him. His father was never the nicest man, and didnâ€™t become nicer after the death of Delilah Diamond.
> 
> You can find him in:
> 
> * [[[SCP-4648 | SCP-4648]]]
> * [[[SCP-4688 | SCP-4688]]] (mentioned)
> * [[[SCP-5551 | SCP-5551]]]
> * [[[SCP-4795 | SCP-4795]]]
> * [[[SCP-7262 | SCP-7262]]]

@@ @@
++ __**Dr. Juniper Marigold**__

**Name:** Dr. Juniper â€œMarigoldâ€ Daisy

**Clearance Level:** Level 4

**Profession:** Microbiology researcher, sapient anomalies specialist

**Location:** Site 23, Site 43

**Profile:** Dr. Marigold communicates somewhat stoically, keeping a monotone voice, an expressionless face. Despite this, her individuality still shines through in her mannerisms such as: sitting on the floor opposed to a chair as much as possible, constantly moving one of her limbs (eg: leg, arm, hand, or rocking back and forth), being incredibly blunt, not realizing when things she says are out of place, and extreme love of animals with more than four limbs (which shows). Dr. Marigold enjoys watching the fish tank in her office, reading books, judging other peopleâ€™s decisions, and interacting with safe class anomalies.

**History:** Dr. Marigold has been working for the Foundation every since she received her master's degree in microbiology. She became aware and interested in the position due to her motherâ€™s job as a Foundation researcher.

After two years of working with her mother, incident â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ-â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ occurred, ending in her motherâ€™s termination. Although Dr. Marigold was not involved, she still felt it was her job to take her motherâ€™s place. She took up working with sapient anomalies and is now where she is today.

> **Author Notes:**
> 
> Autistic
> 
> Followed her mother to work one day as a child and the amnestics didn't take full affect, revealing her resistance to amnestics; her resistance to memetics and cognitohazards was later discovered
> 
> Has two crabs named Leopold and Buttercream that were discovered in a pet store
> 
> Loves sea animals, especially crabs
> 
> Low-key angry at her mother, and strives to be better than her
> 
> Father never in the picture
> 
> Ace Ace Baby (sheâ€™s asexual)
> 
> You can find her in:
> 
> * [[[SCP-4208 | SCP-4208]]]
> * [[[SCP-5090 | SCP-5090]]]
> * [[[SCP-4795 | SCP-4795]]]
> * [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/messaging-crustaceans | Messaging Crustaceans]]]
@@ @@
++ __**Dr. Kenny Hart**__

**Name:** Dr. Kenneth Hart

**Clearance Level:** Level 4

**Occupation:** Site Psychologist

**Specialties:** Personnel recovery following interactions with emotionally stressing anomalies

**Location:** Site 23, Site 288

**Profile:** Dr. Hart is a man who prefers to keep to himself. He doesnâ€™t often express his emotions and has only [[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4412 | one]]] close friend. Despite this, his work as a psychologist has remained unaffected.

Dr. Hart has a past with getting into physical fights, and winning by a landslide. It's not a part of himself he prefers to share.

> **Author Notes:**
> 
> Dr. Hart and Researcher Gates are dating, but have not and do not plan to inform the Foundation of this.
> 
> Dr. Hart is //incredibly// easy to anger, especially if Researcher Gates is insulted around him. Heâ€™s been working on it, but he has a bit of a lack on impulse control.
> 
> Has intermittent explosive disorder and depression
> 
> Grew up in and out of juvenile detention and mental hospitals due to extreme anger issues
> 
> Has a dislike for "authority" but doesn't openly show this
> 
> Doesn't like using his full name "Kenneth" and prefers the nickname Kenny
> 
> You can find him in:
> 
> * [[[SCP-4412 | SCP-4412]]]
> * [[[SCP-7226 | SCP-7226]]]
> * [[[*http://scp-wiki.net/entropy-or-how-things-fall-apart | Entropy, or How Things Fall Apart]]]
> * [[[SCP-7489 | SCP-7489]]]
> * [[[SCP-7262 | SCP-7262]]]
> 
> I really though I had him in more published pieces
@@ @@
++ __**Researcher Kevin R. Gates**__

**Name:** Kevin R. Gates

**Clearance Level:** Level 2

**Occupation:** Semi-retired Mechanical Engineer

**Profile:** After his interaction with [[[*http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4412 | SCP-4412]]], Researcher Gates has not worked with many anomalies due to decline in mental health.

As Researcher Gates is a very talented engineer, efforts to re-introduce him to work with SCPs have been initiated, beginning with work with anomalous items (excluding those with mind-affecting properties of any kind).

> **Authorâ€™s Notes:**
> 
> Has Persistent Complex Bereavement Disorder, generalized anxiety disorder, major depressive disorder, and is a recovering alcoholic.
> 
> Killed his sister in a car crash via manslaughter while drunk, had the choice of jail or the foundation as he worked for the government, and the foundation already had their eye out for him, read [[[SCP-4412]]] for details itâ€™s all explained there
> 
> Likes dogs
> 
> You can find him in:
> * [[[SCP-4412 | SCP-4412]]]
> * [[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/her-final-thoughts | Her Final Thoughts]]] (mentioned, about his sister)

------

And a short list of my not as prominent characters (that I hope to use more!):

**Junior Researcher Quinn Whyte:** A depressed relatively new foundation employee who hates his job and hopes to do something great one day.

**Dr. Marvin Waters:** Researcher Whyte's boss. A generally nice guy who mostly does office work due to a permanent leg injury.

**Dr. Dolly Dickson:** A sweet southern girl who specializes in phenomena. [[[*http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4482 | Star Villa's]]] girlfriend.

**Agent Micheal "Oreo" O'Riley:** An agent who likes to get right to the point. Not good with humor, but is okay with the nickname.

**Dr. Mark Good:** Pathologist, took Senior Researcher McNamara's position after he [[[*http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4846 | retired]]].

**Dr. April Perry:** Likes to handle the dirty work on the field, works with Dr. Good and Dr. Nelly Flowers.

**Dr. Nelly Flowers/"Dr. Flo":** Works with stubborn sapient anomalies and dangerous sapient anomalies. Dating Dr. Jessica Thompson.

**Dr. Jessica Thompson:** Does a lot of desk work and interviews. Dating Dr. Nelly Flowers.

**--Dr.-- Agent Epon Scarlett:** An egotistical, delusional reality bender.  The Foundation is still trying to catch him.

**Prof. Elizabeth Wilbert:** Lead of Scarlett's case, dealt with his bullshit before he was fired, and still deals with it now.

**Director Atticus Charleston:** A level headed man with some dark trauma behind him, he moves forward to always do his best to do what's right.

[[/tab]]
[[tab Log of Anomalous Items Entries]]
To document my entries to the good ol log

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Item Description:** An atlantic rock crab (//Cancer irroratus//) and a flower crab (//Portunus armatus//) which when tasked to play any card game, will win every time. When both are set to play against each other, the Atlantic rock crab will win.
**Date of Recovery:** 04/23/2015
**Location of Recovery:** Ruff and Rumble Pets, â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ, Pennsylvania.
**Current Status:** An aquarium in Dr. Marigold's office.
//Note - How on God's green earth was this discovered? -- Dr. Dickson//
//Note - I don't care. All I know is these guys have won me 25 bucks. -- Dr. Diamond//
//Note - Leopld and Buttercream are not to be used for gambling purposes, you asshole! -- Dr. Marigold//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Item Description:** An AcuRite 75099M 10-inch LED Digital Clock which only displays the words "GET A WATCH". Attempts to program it otherwise have failed; item is unable to be powered off, even by removing the batteries.
**Date of Recovery:** 09/05/2014
**Location of Recovery:** A dormitory in Chesapeake College, â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ, Oregon.
**Current Status:** Dr. Diamond's office.
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Item Description:** A singular physical copy of //Otomatchi Una//, a Japanese VOCALOID which displays sentience when operational.
**Date of Recovery:** 09/17/2019
**Location of Recovery:** A house in Norfolk, Virginia.
**Current Status:** Standard-maintenance low-threat anomalous item storage. SCP status pending.
[[/div]]      

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Item Description:** A paper mate ink pen that will teleport from its current location at random, usually after at least a week of staying within one place at a time.
**Date of Recovery:** 10/25/2019
**Current Status:** Unknown
**Note:** //Sometimes it just appears back at a containment site. We use it as a normal pen since it functions as one, then it disappears again not to be seen for however long.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Item Description:** A Nintendo DS cartridge of the video game //â€œPokÃ©mon Black Versionâ€// in which after the final battle between the player and N Harmonia, in addition to the usual dialogue, N Harmonia turns to the camera and says the following:
â€œI understand things are hard right now. But I believe in you. Keep fighting.â€
**Date of Recovery:** 01/14/2023
**Current Status:** Standard-maintenance low-threat anomalous item storage.
[[/div]]
